channel.title: Eclipse 639 ::item (as in buy item) ::sellitem/unspawnable help!
channel.description:
I would like to know how to add a ::item/::sellitem command to buy unspawnable's
I would also like to make some unspawnable items unbuyable.
I have looked at Eclipse 639's codes but they do not seem to work. The only one I've been able to implement is a ::item command to spawn every item.
Any ideas?

item.title: Eclipse 639 ::item (as in buy item) ::sellitem/unspawnable help!
item.dc:creator: @Sunbred_Rush Sunbred Rush
item.description:
@Sunbred_Rush wrote:

I would like to know how to add a ::item/::sellitem command to buy unspawnable’s

I would also like to make some unspawnable items unbuyable.

I have looked at Eclipse 639’s codes but they do not seem to work. The only one I’ve been able to implement is a ::item command to spawn every item.

Any ideas?
